channel.title: Help with an AI creator
channel.description:
I need help creating an AI creator, what it does is create a random scene of a number of 0-4 twice on top and twice below that, and there are options are[ left hit right, left hit left, right hit left, right hit right, and divide] I just want someone to make it be able to log the scene's variables into a MySQL table, log IP's and the answer, this is not really an AI but more of a pre-programed script. But the scene never has both 0 on top or bottom.
so it would be like L1 R3 L2 R1 left hit right, left hit left, right hit left, right hit right, or divide
options, I can make the code export script though.

item.title: Help with an AI creator
item.dc:creator: @kloplop321 kloplop321
item.description:
@kloplop321 wrote:

that isn’t what I meant… I mean the fingers on the hands will be random,not what the user does, that wouldn’t even help the programming

Read full topic

item.title: Help with an AI creator
item.dc:creator: @OnlyOneRule OnlyOneRule
item.description:
@OnlyOneRule wrote:

ill get you started as i dont really understand what your on about

a simple random function:
[php]

<?php $rand = rand(0,4); if($rand==1){ $variable = left hit right; } if($rand==2){ $variable = left hit left; } if($rand==3){ $variable = right hit left; } if($rand==4){ $variable = right hit right; } if($rand==0){ $variable = Divide; } ?>

[/php]

ignore this silly code if its not what your looking for, you just really have me confused… whats an AI?

Read full topic

item.title: Help with an AI creator
item.dc:creator: @kloplop321 kloplop321
item.description:
@kloplop321 wrote:

I don’t want a engine, just a random scene generator(if you read my post thouroughly) and records the answers, not use them for future things, just record them, I will make an exporter that will dump all of the recorded data into code, I know how to do that, It is just that I am quite busy at the moment with school things.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with an AI creator
item.dc:creator: @pplsuqbawlz pplsuqbawlz
item.description:
@pplsuqbawlz wrote:

Well get coding. Entire engine’s aren’t copy paste. Or at least, decent engines, aren’t.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with an AI creator
item.dc:creator: @kloplop321 kloplop321
item.description:
@kloplop321 wrote:

I need help creating an AI creator, what it does is create a random scene of a number of 0-4 twice on top and twice below that, and there are options are[ left hit right, left hit left, right hit left, right hit right, and divide] I just want someone to make it be able to log the scene’s variables into a MySQL table, log IP’s and the answer, this is not really an AI but more of a pre-programed script. But the scene never has both 0 on top or bottom.

so it would be like
L1 R3
L2 R1
left hit right, left hit left, right hit left, right hit right, or divide

options, I can make the code export script though.
